text: Erisa n’amuddamu nti, “Oyagala nkuyambe ntya? Ntegeeza, olina ki mu nnyumba?” N’amugamba nti, “Omuweereza wo ky’alinawo kyokka mu nnyumba twe tufuta4:2 Mu bitundu ebyo, amafuta ag’omuzeeyituuni gaali geetagibwa mu kufumba buli mmere. Ate era gaayambanga okukuuma omubiri gwonna nga mulamu bulungi. otutono ennyo.”
